title: ArmedForces.io

headings.text: Capture the Flag or Bomb Defuse?

content.howToPlay: Start with arranging your loadout from the Equipments section before participating in any online battles in this io game.There are eight weapons of any kind to unlock in this section. You can pick the Micro Mac-10 or the R840. Or, you can choose the SKS.You are free to enter any battle with two different loadouts with these eight options. After grabbing your guns, you are ready for intense battles!You can quickly enter the battling field by clicking the "Battle" button. Choose the game mode you want to play and tap on "Confirm and Play."Whatever path you choose, your main goal in this multiplayer game is survival!

fullContent: Home› ShootingArmedForces.ioBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPrepare for epic battles! ArmedForces.io is a 3D action game where you will combat enemy forces on various game maps with multiple game mode choices. Arrange your loadouts from eight unique weapons at your disposal.Try to survive among fierce rivals alongside your team or against everyone else. Furthermore, you can customize your arsenal with silencers or weapon sights as you progress in this first-person shooter game!WASD or the Arrow Keys: MoveLeft-Shift: RunSpacebar: SlideNumber Keys: Change WeaponsLeft-Mouse Button: FireRight-Mouse Button: AimE or F: Interact / Pick up a WeaponG: Throw a DynamiteH: Use MedKitT: ChatL: Toggle Cursor LockC: CrouchN: Show ScoreboardESC: PauseHow to Play ArmedForces.ioStart with arranging your loadout from the Equipments section before participating in any online battles in this io game.There are eight weapons of any kind to unlock in this section. You can pick the Micro Mac-10 or the R840. Or, you can choose the SKS.You are free to enter any battle with two different loadouts with these eight options. After grabbing your guns, you are ready for intense battles!You can quickly enter the battling field by clicking the "Battle" button. Choose the game mode you want to play and tap on "Confirm and Play."Whatever path you choose, your main goal in this multiplayer game is survival!Capture the Flag or Bomb Defuse?ArmedForces.io offers you 5 game modes. And each mode has a different purpose. In the Team Deathmatch mode, you will fight against the enemies alongside your team. You will try to be the last soldier standing in the Free For All mode.On the other hand, you need to take the flag from your opponent's area and bring it to your area in Capture the Flag mode. Try to explore each of the given modes in this action game!Team Deathmatch Free for AllCapture the FlagBomb Defuse Gun GameEquipment Section in ArmedForces.ioWe have listed below what you can find in the equipment section:MP5Micro Mac-10R840AKM SG554MinimiSKS M40A3P226Combat Knife Basic ArmorFrag Grenade SyringeCheck Your Stats!In the profile section, you can change the nickname and load/save code (only experience can be saved through this code. You can replace your current load code with another one that loads a higher value.)
